Headline: #119 Michigan/119th Temporary Reroute at 119th/Wentworth
ShortDescription: 119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, Wentowrth, 115th, Halsted and 119th: due to, street blockage near 119th/Wentworth.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#119 Michigan/119th buses are temporarily rerouted via 119th, Wentowrth, 115th, Halsted and 119th: due to, street blockage near 119th/Wentworth.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Kostner/Congress
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are still standing near the area of Kostner/Congress due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are still standing near the area of Kostner/Congress due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are requested from Western (Forest Park Branch) to Forest Park to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
